thread.title: 5 Pillars Of Guitar Practice If You Don't Have Time To Practice 8 Hours A Day [News]
thread.title_full: 5 Pillars Of Guitar Practice If You Don't Have Time To Practice 8 Hours A Day [News]

title: 5 Pillars Of Guitar Practice If You Don't Have Time To Practice 8 Hours A Day [News]
text:
5 Pillars of Guitar Practice if You Don't Have Time to Practice 8 Hours a Day If your time for chops workout is limited, this is how to approach it. UG News editor since early 2013. King Crimson fan. I handle the news around here. Posted 8 hours ago 1 
Guitar instructor Phillip McKnight recently offered an interesting video featuring what he sees as the 5 pillars of guitar practice for guitarists who can't dedicate 8 hours a day to perfecting their craft. 
The musician explained: "There are tons of videos and articles about practice habits, mostly written by professional guitar players, and they tell you things like they practice eight hours a day. 
"It's important to understand that they're like marathon runners at this point in their careers. They need to practice a lot to accommodate the amount of playing they're doing. 
"So what I've learned over the years is this system that allows me to always spend time with my guitar every day." 
Check out the video below for the whole thing.
